testimonials.title: Real Results from BETA Users
testimonials.subtitle: See What Business Owners Are Saying
testimonials.description: Early adopters are already saving hours and improving ratings

item1.name: Ahmed Al-Mansouri
item1.text: I was spending 4 hours daily responding to reviews. Now AI replies in under a minute. My rating went from 3.8 to 4.6 in 2 months!

item2.name: Sarah Al-Hashimi
item2.text: The speed is incredible. Patients leave a review and get a response before they even leave the parking lot. It shows we care.

item3.name: Omar Al-Farsi
item3.text: Managing 8 locations was impossible. Now AI handles everything automatically. I just check weekly summaries. Worth every dirham!

item1.question: How does the AI generate responses?
item1.answer: Our AI uses advanced natural language processing to understand the context of reviews and questions, then generates personalized, human-like responses based on your business tone and preferences. You can customize the AI's style and review all responses before they're sent.

item2.question: Can I review responses before they're posted?
item2.answer: Absolutely! You have full control. You can set the AI to auto-post, require approval, or use a hybrid approach where only certain types of responses need review. Most customers start with manual approval and gradually trust the AI more.

item3.question: How many locations can I manage?
item3.answer: It depends on your plan. The Free plan supports 1 location, Pro supports up to 5 locations, and Enterprise supports unlimited locations. You can easily upgrade as your business grows.

item4.question: Is my data secure?
item4.answer: Yes! We use bank-level encryption (AES-256) for all data. We're SOC 2 compliant and never share your data with third parties. Your Google Business Profile credentials are stored securely using OAuth 2.0.

item5.question: What languages are supported?
item5.answer: We support 50+ languages including English, Arabic, Spanish, French, German, Chinese, and more. The AI can automatically detect the language of incoming reviews and respond in the same language.

item6.question: Can I cancel anytime?
item6.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties or fees. Your data will remain accessible for 30 days after cancellation, giving you time to export if needed.

item7.question: Do you offer a free trial?
item7.answer: Yes! All paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required. You can test all features and see the value before committing.

item8.question: How long does setup take?
item8.answer: Most businesses are up and running in under 10 minutes. Simply connect your Google Business Profile, configure your AI preferences, and you're ready to go. We also offer free onboarding support for Enterprise customers.

aiChat.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help you today?

responses.reviews: To respond to reviews, go to the Reviews page. I can help you generate AI-powered responses that are professional and personalized!
responses.analytics: Check the Analytics page to see detailed insights about your business performance, including review trends, rating analysis, and more.
responses.youtube: For YouTube management, visit the YouTube Dashboard where you can view your videos, analytics, and manage comments with AI assistance.
responses.locations: Manage your Google My Business locations from the Locations page. You can update information, view reviews, and track performance.
responses.help: I'm here to help! You can ask me about reviews, analytics, YouTube, locations, or any other feature. Just type your question!
responses.default: I'm not sure about that, but I'm learning! Try asking about reviews, analytics, YouTube, or locations. Or check our Help Center for more information.

chat.title: AI Chat Assistant
chat.welcome: Hi! I'm your AI assistant. I can help you with reviews, posts, questions, and more. What would you like to do today?

responses.reviews: I can help you with reviews! You have 5 pending reviews that need responses. Would you like me to draft replies for them?
responses.posts: Great! I can help you create engaging posts. What would you like to post about? I can suggest trending topics or generate content for you.
responses.questions: I see you have 3 unanswered questions. I can draft professional responses for all of them. Shall we start?
responses.default:
I'm here to help! I can assist with:

‚Ä¢ Creating posts
